title: Still can't play
body: Since the recent patch didn't load on my Mac I thought I had to uninstall and download the game again but that was working either. Then found out that I wasn't the only one with this problem, everyone that had a mac were in the same spot. But since I uninstall the game it doesn't let me download it right, I need help I wanna play. The videos I look up on YouTube there so old it doesn't help me... pls Riot help me ðŸ˜”ðŸ˜­

replies.body: Are there any specific issues or error messages that you're getting when trying to run League? Let me know what kind troubles you've been having and I can help you go through a few troubleshooting steps, or you can always feel free to reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

i just download the game and once i need to move it to the app folder it makes a decline noise and i go to the app folder and i open league and its downloading but then it never opes the game 
thats all it do
